001package com.github.nradov.abnffuzzer;
002
003import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006
007import org.junit.Test;
008
009/**
010 * Test the definition of ABNF in ABNF.
011 * 
012 * @author Nick Radov
013 */
014public class AbnfTest {
015
016        @Test
017        public void testGenerateAscii() throws IOException {
018                final Fuzzer rfc5234 = new Fuzzer(this.getClass().getResourceAsStream("/rfc5234.txt"));
019                for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
020                        final String abnf = rfc5234.generateAscii("rule") + "\n";
021                        assertTrue(abnf.contains("="));
022                }
023        }
024
025}
